inclusion.criterion: Barcelona Clinic Liver Cancer stage C or stage B if you cannot tolerate or failed TACE
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: No cirrhosis or Child-Pugh A cirrhosis
inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: physical exam and lab studies are not remarkable for any other abnormalities

inclusion.criterion: All acute toxic effects of any prior treatment have resolved to NCI-CTCAE v4.0 grade 1 or less
inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: lab studies are not remarkable for any other abnormalities

inclusion.criterion: Able to swallow and retain oral medication
inclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Clinically apparent central nervous system metastases or carcinomatous meningitis
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: Patient is a 16-year-old girl recently diagnosed with myasthenia gravis, class IIa. She complains of diplopia and weakness affecting in her upper extremities.
